DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomize , control , cross single meal study investigate metabolic effect breakfast rich dairy protein determine biomarkers intake . The result project increase knowledge nutritional value dairy protein , necessary decide whether dairy product recommend prevention weight relate bone loss .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Effects Dairy Meat Proteins Bone Metabolism Metabolic Profile
DOC.criteria: Healthy male females 18 50 year BMI 2540 Physical activity 10 hour weekly Smoking Diagnosed osteoporosis least one parent Dietary supplement vitamin pill ( study 2 month start ) Vegetarians vegan Lactose intolerant Women pregnant , breastfeed postmenstrual Regular intake medication Chronic disease ( include osteoporosis , cancer , diabetes , cardiovascular disease mental disorder ) Participation clinical trial could affect test result Donation blod within 3 month intervention start Hypersensitivity paraaminobenzoic acid ( PABA ) Not able comply procedure establish Protocol
